AI Ipsum

Why have dummy filler text when you can have smart, AI-powered (kind of) filler text?


The AI Ipsum API

That's right, you can also use an API to get all of your AI wordy goodness.

Just make a GET request like the following and you'll get back a JSON object with the AI Ipsum. 

			GET https://ai-ipsum.netlify.app/ipsum/{quantity}
This project is lovingly brought to you by the nerds at Contenda, the AI companion for dev advocates and content creators.
Check us out and see how we can take any video, from a conference talk to an interview to a demo, and turn it into effective written content (...not just filler text, we promise)!
